price: Akasema: Inshaallah, Mwenyezi Mungu akipenda, utaniona mvumilivu, wala sitoasi amri yako.
arabic: قَالَ سَتَجِدُنِيٓ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ صَابِرٗا وَلَآ أَعۡصِي لَكَ أَمۡرٗا
footnotes: Musa akasema: Inshallah, Mwenyezi Mungu akipenda, utaniona mimi ni mwenye kusubiri, na mt'iifu kwako kwa yote utayo niamrisha.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla satajidunī in shāa al-lahu ṣābiran walā aʿṣī laka amran
